issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We need the "verify" module that will send Ti+ module guid info to https://api.appcelerator.net/p/v1/module-verify.

Sample post body looks like this:

{code}
{
	"deploytype": "development",
	"guid": "667ea9ab-0f6a-46e7-b66d-346662f4ec97",
	"appid": "com.test.test1",
	"platform": "mobileweb",
	"modules": [
		{
			"id": "com.test.module1",
			"guid": "23d30f94-feb6-4a04-b440-dc111e9e6e8b",
			"author": "Module Developer <module@developer.com>",
			"description": "Test Module 1",
			"name": "test1",
			"copyright": "Copyright (c) 2012 by Module Developer",
			"license": "Apache",
			"version": "1.0"
		}
	],
	"version": "1.0",
	"name": "Test 1",
	"success": true,
	"code": 0,
	"reason": "good to go"
}
{code}

The Mobile Web boot process MUST verify all modules BEFORE loading app.js.

comments.body: Marking ticket as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
